snippet.title: Stoneguard Demo Gameplay Clip
snippet.description:
Short clip of the second day in Stoneguard. Here we are recruiting some survivors and giving them tasks, and fighting monsters at night!

Find out more on our Steam page and don't forget to wishlist!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2704450

Follow us to learn more about the develpoment of the game:
Instagram:   https://www.instagram.com/stoneguard_game
X:   https://twitter.com/Stoneguard_Game
Reddit:   https://www.reddit.com/r/Stoneguard_Game/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/people/Stoneguard-the-game/61554506431630/
